long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to Play?
Tap and move your finger to the left or right to move the ball.

Dancing Ball Hop is most engaging game where you need to clear levels hopping on same colored bricks. Show your hopping skills, concentration power and one finger touch control.

Extension Button Menu
*Play more games and explore exciting themes on the page menu buttons.
